shows.title: Cold
shows.plot_overview: Lithuania, 1991. As the country is fighting its bloody last stand against the crumbling Soviet empire, a young US-German journalist discovers some documents that are essential for the KGB to maintain control of the “separatist” republics. The disappearance of these top-secret files starts a deadly and desperate chase across Eastern Europe, involving five individuals who are unknowingly interconnected through personal stories of love, betrayal and revenge.

shows.title: 56 Days
shows.plot_overview: After meeting randomly in a supermarket, Oliver and Ciara fall for each other fast, and dangerously hard. Fifty-six days later, homicide investigators arrive at Oliver's apartment to find an unidentified body—brutally murdered and intentionally decomposed.

shows.title: Eyes of Wakanda
shows.plot_overview: Follow the adventures of brave Wakandan warriors throughout history in this globe-trotting adventure, where they must carry out dangerous missions to retrieve Vibranium artifacts from the enemies of Wakanda. They are the Hatut Zaraze and this is their story.

shows.title: The Fridge
shows.plot_overview: Wishing to escape from the chaos of his life, Makorn finds a house to rent. It has all the amenities but a refrigerator. He buys one second hand, and that night, Makorn gets a shock when he opens the fridge and his hand meets with another on the other side. The hand's owner is Pleo, a 29-year-old with a painful past. Once they each recover from their shock, they talk and discover they're communicating across different times. For Pleo, it's still Thai year 2550.

shows.title: Had I Not Seen the Sun
shows.plot_overview: Filmmaker Zhou Pin-yu interviews a serial killer in prison — an encounter that triggers a string of mysterious events tied to a buried past.
